title.narrative: Credit and Financial Services: Promoting Rural Opportunities Sustainable Profits and Environmental Resilience

description.narrative: Climate Change PROSPER seeks to strengthen the integration, climate resilience and environmental sustainability of smallholders and businesses in priority value chains in the Northern and Middle Belts, taking advantage of the increased demand generated by Government to strengthen agro-processing. In addition, the project will support the development of tree crop value chains, poultry production and opportunities for people with disabilities, which has not been addressed by ongoing IFAD projects except on an emergency basis during COVID- 19. This will be the first intervention in Ghana to incorporate the Green Climate Fund (GCF) within the agricultural sector.Inclusive Financial ServicesDev of rural enterprises and job opportunities
